mm.core.cannotconnect: Cannot connect: Verify that your have typed correctly the URL and that your site uses Moodle 2.4 or later.
mm.core.lostconnection: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you will have to reconnect to the site.
mm.core.networkerrormsg: Network not enabled or not working.
mm.core.unexpectederror: Unexepected error. Please close and reopen the application to try again
mm.core.wsfunctionnotavailable: The webservice function is not available.
mm.course.activitynotyetviewable: This activity or resource is not yet viewable in the app.
mm.course.activitynotyetviewablegothere: This activity or resource is not yet viewable in the app, click the button below to access it from the site.
mm.course.couldnotloadsections: Could not load the sections, please try again later.
mm.course.couldnotloadsectioncontent: Could not load the section content, please try again later.
mm.course.nocontentavailable: No content available at the moment.
mm.courses.errorloadcourses: An error occurred while loading courses.
mm.login.credentialsdescription: Please provide your username and password to login on
mm.login.confirmdeletesite: Are you sure you want to delete the site {{sitename}}?
mm.login.erroraccesscontrolalloworigin: The Cross-Origin call you're trying to perform has been rejected. Please check https://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_Mobile_development_using_Chrome_or_Chromium
mm.login.errordeletesite: An error occurred while deleting this site. Please try again.
mm.login.errorloadsite: An error occurred while loading this site. Please try again.
mm.login.errorupdatesite: An error ocurred while updating the site's token.
mm.login.helpmelogin:
There are many thousands of Moodle sites around the world. This app can only connect to Moodle sites that have specifically enabled Mobile app access.

If you can't connect to your Moodle site then you need to contact a Moodle administrator at the place where you want to connect and ask them to read http://docs.moodle.org/en/Mobile_app

To test the app in a Moodle demo site type teacher or student in the Site URL field and click the Add button.
mm.login.invalidaccount: Please check your login details or ask your site administrator to check the site configuration.
mm.login.invalidmoodleversion: Invalid Moodle version. The minium version required is 2.4.
mm.login.logininsiterequired: You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
mm.login.mobileservicesnotenabled: Mobile Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your Moodle site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
mm.login.newsitedescription: Please enter the URL of your Moodle site. Note that it might not be configured to work with this app.
mm.login.notloggedin: You need to be logged in.
mm.login.reconnectdescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site.
mm.login.reconnectssodescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site. You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
mm.login.siteinmaintenance: Your site is in maintenance mode
mm.login.siteurlrequired: Site URL required, i.e http://www.yourmoodlesite.abc or https://www.yourmoodlesite.efg
mm.login.webservicesnotenabled: Web Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your Moodle site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
mma.files.admindisableddownload: Please note that your Moodle administrator disabled file downloads, you can browse through the files but not download them.
mma.files.clicktoupload: Click the button below to upload files to your private files.
mma.files.couldnotloadfiles: The list of files could not be loaded.
mma.files.errormustbeonlinetoupload: You have to be online to upload files.
mma.files.errornoapp: You don't have an app installed to perform this action.
mma.files.errorwhiledownloading: An error occured while trying to download the file.
mma.files.errorwhileuploading: An error occured during the file upload.
mma.files.errorwhilerecordingaudio: An error occured while trying to record audio.
mma.files.myprivatefilesdesc: The files that are available in your private area on this Moodle site.
mma.files.sitefilesdesc: The other files that are available to you on this Moodle site.
